2050.SR.summary: Savola Group Company, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes food products in the Middle East, North Africa, and Turkey region. It offers edible oils, vegetable ghee, sugar, pasta, baked goods, specialty fats, seafood, and frozen food products. The company also engages in the agro cultivation, services and maintenance, trading and distribution, and real estate activities. In addition, it retails groceries through a chain of hypermarkets and supermarkets. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

2100.SR.long_name: Wafrah for Industry and Development Company
2100.SR.summary: Wafrah for Industry and Development Company engages in manufacturing, canning, preserving, processing, and marketing food products in Saudi Arabia and internationally. It provides pasta products, potato chips, frozen French fries products, peanut products, and breakfast cereals, as well as frozen, chilled, and cooked meat products. The company markets its products under the Wafra, Caprini, Saudi Garden, and Nemah brands. It is also involved in the treatment and processing of agricultural products; and investment in land property. The company was formerly known as Food Products Company and changed its name to Wafrah for Industry and Development Company in 2014. Wafrah for Industry and Development Company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

2280.SR.summary: Almarai Company, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated consumer food and beverage company in Saudi Arabia, rest of Gulf Cooperation Council countries, Egypt, and Jordan. The company operates through Dairy and Juice, Bakery, Poultry, and Other Activities segments. It offers dairy, fruit juice, and related food products under the Almarai, Joosy Life, Beyti, and Teeba brand names; bakery products under the L'usine and 7 Days brand names; and poultry products under Alyoum and AlBashayer brand names. The company also engages in the arable and horticulture activities; and provision of infant nutrition products under the Nuralac and Evolac brand names. Almarai Company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

4061.SR.summary: Anaam International Holding Group Company engages in food, agriculture, and estate development businesses in Saudi Arabia. The company imports, distributes, and sells frozen food products, including chicken, mutton, fish, potatoes, vegetables, fruits, and other products. It also produces grain and fodder products, such as alfalfa, corn, wheat, fruits and vegetables, tomatoes, potatoes, onions, and other products, as well as owns agricultural land with an area of 100,000,000 square meters in the fertile agricultural Albesitae northern Saudi Arabia. In addition, the company manages and leases cold and dry storage facilities; builds, manages, and maintains commercial centers; and builds, manages, and operates industrial projects. Further, it undertakes contracts to build residential complexes, commercial centers, economic cities, and industrial properties; constructs, sells, and leases buildings; leases construction machinery and equipment; and undertakes finishing works in construction, as well as provides construction maintenance, and construction materials wholesale and retail services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

4290.SR.long_name: Al Khaleej Training and Education Company
4290.SR.summary: Al Khaleej Training and Education Company engages in the computer, language, education projects, financial and management training, communication centers, and schools businesses in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company's Computer segment offers advanced programming, networking, and computer solutions to individuals and corporates. Its Language segment provides training courses in English language. The company's Education Projects segment offers educational projects to universities and the Ministry of Education, as well as operates orientation years for Saudi universities. Its Financial and Management Training segment provides management, leadership, stock trading, and other courses. The company's Communication Centers segment provides management and operating services for customer service centers through telephone for companies and bodies. Its School segment operates private educational schools for boys/girls. The company also offers training solutions for women hairdressers, beauty salons staff, students, cosmetic consultants, nutritionists, and fitness specialists through Formul'A Academy. In addition, the company provides lifeboat and fast rescue boat training, as well as management training solutions through New Dimension center. Further, it offers manpower and human resources to call centers and customer care services. Additionally, the company is involved in the establishment and construction of schools and cafeterias; installation of networks; provision of infrastructures, communication systems, operation and maintenance, and computer software, as well as online training and technical support services. It also provides franchise rights to various brands. Al Khaleej Training and Education Company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

4292.SR.summary: Ataa Educational Company, an education company, engages in the establishment of kindergarten, primary, middle, and secondary schools for boys and girls in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Private Schools, International Schools, Indian Schools, and French Schools segments. It is also involved in the establishment, management, and operation and maintenance of computer training centers. Ataa Educational Company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

6001.SR.summary: Halwani Bros. Co. Ltd. produces, manufactures, and distributes food products in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers Middle Eastern food products, such as sweets; meat products; breaded chicken and burgers; jams; dairy products; cheese; juices; provisions, such as olive oil, olives, peppers, and pickles; bakery products stuffed with dates, and packaging products. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

6020.SR.summary: Al Gassim Investment Holding Co. invests in agriculture business. It engages in manufacturing, packaging, and marketing of agricultural and food products. The company also invests in stocks and other securities; general contracting; food and non-food items; import and export, and other business; and industrial, education, health, and transport sectors. In addition, it offers refrigeration units and transportation services; and invests in real estate sector for planning, developing, buying, and selling of land, commercial, and residential complexes, as well as hotels. The company was formerly known as Qassim Agriculture Company and changed its name to Al Gassim Investment Holding Co. in January 2017. Al Gassim Investment Holding Co. was founded in 1985 and is based in Buraydah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

6040.SR.summary: Tabuk Agricultural Development Company produces and sells agricultural products in Saudi Arabia. It offers vegetables, such as potatoes and onions; fruits, including apricots, figs, grapes, nectarines, peaches, pears, and plums; wheat grains and seeds; alfalfa and forage; and olive oil. The company also provides consultancy services for water resource management. In addition, it exports onions. The company holds an area of approximately 35,000 hectares. It sells its products under the TADCO brand. Tabuk Agricultural Development Company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Tabuk, Saudi Arabia.

6060.SR.summary: Eastern Development Company engages in the agricultural business in Saudi Arabia and internationally. The company produces agricultural products, including maize, clover, fodder, Rhodes grass, wheat and corn hay, and dates. It is also involved in the animal husbandry activities, including the production of fresh milk, calf breeding, calves fattening, sheep production, and bio-fertilizer and honey production. In addition, the company rents farming land; undertakes the land reclamation and irrigation projects; and imports grains and animal fodder, as well as imports and manufactures agriculture equipment. Eastern Development Company was founded in 1986 and is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia.

6070.SR.summary: Al-Jouf Agricultural Development Co. produces and sells agricultural products in Saudi Arabia. Its products include wheat, barley, maize, fodder crops, potatoes, onion, and olive; fruits, such as peaches, apricots, plums, pears, and grapes; and vegetables consisting of tomatoes, peppers, squashes, cucumbers, and eggplants. The company also operates nurseries to produce seedlings of fruits and olive trees; and serves as a consultant in the agricultural production activities. Al-Jouf Agricultural Development Co. was founded in 1988 and is based in Sakakah, Saudi Arabia.

6090.SR.summary: Jazan Energy and Development Co. engages in the fisheries, agricultural, industrial, and real estate businesses in Saudi Arabia. The company is involved in the establishment of agricultural and livestock projects; rearing and fattening of sheep and calves; production of chickens; fishing activities; establishment of nurseries; and production of fruit seedlings, forest and ornamental trees, and medicinal and aromatic plants. It also engages in the manufacturing and marketing of agricultural, animal, plant, and fish products and their derivatives; wholesale and retail trade of materials, machineries, and agricultural inputs; establishment, development, maintenance, rental, lease, and sale of real estate properties; and general contracting activities. In addition, the company is involved in the establishment, management, maintenance, and operation of industrial projects; and wholesale and retail trade of food, industrial tools, building materials, electrical appliances and tools, and mechanical and electronic apparatus. Further, it engages in the construction, repair, demolition, and restoration of public and residential buildings, commercial buildings, educational and health facilities, airports, and ports; undertaking works of roads and pavements, lighting works, extensions of telephone, water and sanitation, infrastructure, maintenance, and cleanliness; planting gardens and parks; and producing packaged drinking water. Additionally, the company engages in well drilling activities, as well as provides access to commercial agencies. Jazan Energy and Development Co. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jazan, Saudi Arabia.
